entry.name: Dell_DRAC_DriveStatusScript
entry.description: Storage device status as reported by iDRAC7 and newer.

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: physicalDiskState
datapoint.description:
Disk status as monitored by the remote access card.
Status Codes: 1=Unknown. 2=Available for use (no RAID configuration has been assigned). 3=RAID configuration assigned. 4=Disk moved from another controller and contains all or some portion of a virtual disk. 5=Not available to RAID controller. 6=Blocked by controller. 7=Not operational. 8=Not RAID capable. 9=Removed. 10=ReadOnly

datapoint.name: AlertFilter
datapoint.description: A complex datapoint used to filter the status before alerting.
